column1: #Text=Varrick says : " Thank you all for coming for the finale of " Nuktuk : Hero of the South " !
#Text=" You ca n't take some knucklehead earthbender and make him a star " they said .
#Text=" You ca n't teach a polar bear dog to speak " they said .
#Text=Thanks to the magic of the movers , our furry friends have found their voices , and you 'll be shocked to hear what they have to say .
#Text=They speak of the injustice that is happening in the Southern Water Tribe right now .
#Text=My hope , is that their words , and this epic mover , will inspire a real life hero to rise up , and help .
#Text=" Voice narrator says : " When last we left our hero , he was captured by the Evil Unalaq 's dastardly pet bird .
#Text=Amazingly , with the power of his whistling , Nuktuk escaped .
